content.question: Which of the following is evidence that eukaryotes and prokaryotes share a common ancestor?

choices.label: All eukaryotes and prokaryotes contain linear <math alttext="D N A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>DNA</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>.
All eukaryotes and prokaryotes contain ribosomes.
All eukaryotes and prokaryotes use organic molecules as an energy source.
All eukaryotes and prokaryotes are capable of mitosis.

content.answer: All eukaryotes and prokaryotes contain ribosomes.
